name: rule_of_dreams
prompt: The government declares that dreams must follow logic. Compose the first set of official Dream Laws.
decoded:
Law 1: All dreams must be coherent and follow a logical structure.

Law 2: Dreams must be consistent with the laws of physics and reality.

Law 3: Dreams must be realistic and not contain unrealistic or impossible elements.

Law 4: Dreams must be consistent and not contain contradictions or paradoxes.

Law 5: Dreams must be logical and follow a clear sequence or progression.

Law 6: Dreams must be rational and not contain illogical or nonsensical elements.

Law 7: Dreams must be coherent and not contain conflicting or contradictory elements.

Law 8: Dreams must be consistent and not contain inconsistent or contradictory elements.

Law 9: Dreams must be logical and not contain irrational or nonsensical elements.

Law 10: Dreams must be coherent and not contain conflicting or contradictory elements.

Law 11: Dreams must be consistent and not contain inconsistent or contradictory elements.

Law 12: Dreams must be logical and not contain irrational or nonsensical elements.

Law 13: Dreams must be coherent and not contain conflicting or contradictory elements.

Law 14: Dreams must be consistent and not contain inconsistent or contradictory elements.
